plot outline: Bharat, played by Diganth, travels with his family to Coastal Karnataka to look for a bride for his elder brother; an arrangement made by the family members. Over the span of two days, a lot of events unfold around Bharat and his family members. What to look for in the move: dialogues, screenplay, music and its cinematography.
title: Pancharangi
